hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn Mas`ud:A man asked the Prophet (ﷺ) "What deeds are the best?" The Prophet (ﷺ) said: "(1) To perform the (daily compulsory) prayers at their (early) stated fixed times, (2) to be good and dutiful to one's own parents, (3) and to participate in Jihad in Allah's Cause

chapter.ara-name: باب وَسَمَّى النَّبِيُّ صلى الله عليه وسلم الصَّلاَةَ عَمَلاً
chapter.eng-name: The Prophet (ﷺ) called As-Salat a deed and said, “Whoever does not recite Al-Fatiha of the Book in his Salat, his Salat is invalid
